text:
Paying indulgences to #COVAX won't erase the original sin of #VaccineNationalism.
Look at #COVID19 #vaccine allotted to COVAX vs. claimed by high income countries like Canada (most doses per capita in the world). 
Canada needs to commit to donating surplus, @CanadianPM.
🇨🇦💉🌐 https://t.co/2pQEJk1zRy https://t.co/tQ5Fti2bGk
